src:
Lawan Partizan Belgrade, Solskjaer Ogah Cuma Menang 1-0
07 Nov 2019, 16:20 by Bola.net
Bola.net - Sebuah tantangan dilemparkan Ole Gunnar Solskjaer kepada skuat Manchester United. Manajer Manchester United itu menilai timnya harus bisa menang dengan lebih dari satu gol di pertandingan melawan Partizan Belgrade nanti.
Manchester United akan menjamu wakil Serbia itu di Old Trafford dini hari nanti. Kedua tim itu akan memainkan pertandingan keempat grup L Liga Europa musim ini.
Di tiga pertandingan sebelumnya, United masih memegang rekor tidak terkalahkan dengan dua kemenangan dan satu hasil seri. Namun mereka tidak pernah menang dengan lebih dari satu gol di laga tersebut.
Solskjaer ingin timnya bisa tampil lebih garang di pertandingan tersebut. "Kami akan kembali bermain besok dan kami berharap Partizan tidak punya memori indah setelah pertandingan ini," beber Solskjaer kepada MUTV.

Baca komentar lengkap sang pelatih di bawah ini.
text:
Partizan's opponents Belgrade, Solskjaer Do Not Just Win 1-0
Nov 7 2019, 16:20 by Bola.net
Bola.net - A challenge thrown Ole Gunnar Solskjaer to the Manchester United squad. The Manchester United manager believes his team must be able to win by more than one goal in a match against Partizan Belgrade later.
Manchester United will host the Serbian representative at Old Trafford in the early hours of the morning. Both teams will play the Europa League fourth group L match this season.
In the previous three matches, United still holds an unbeaten record with two wins and one draw. But they never won with more than one goal in the match.
Solskjaer wants his team to appear more ferocious in the match. "We will return to play tomorrow and we hope that Partizan does not have a good memory after this match," Solskjaer told MUTV.

Read the trainer's full comment below.
